bookInfo.comments: With: Virginia's Inheritance / by Cooke Don-Carlos. Boston: Davis & Bond, [c1915] -- Fairhaven: A Story of Pilgrim Land / by Justis Henry G. D. Boston: Christopher Publishing House, [c1917] -- Flames of the Blue Ridge / by Ethel and James Dorrance. New York: The Macaulay Company, [1919] -- Glory Rides the Range / by Ethel and James Dorrance. New York: The Macaulay Company, c1920. -- His Robe of Honor / by E. S. and J. F. Dorrance. New York: Moffat, Yard & Company, 1916. -- Young Low / by George A. Dorsey. New York: George H. Doran Company, c1917. -- Uncle Charlie's Story Book: Fun, Fact and Fancy. (Fiftieth Birthday Souvenir) / Lovingly Dedicated to Old Friends and New by Charles Noel Douglas. Brooklyn: Charles Noel Douglas, [c1913]

imprint.imprintFull: New York: The Neale Publishing Company, 1913
